name: Neopets pink glitter
description: an edit of Grafflewizz pink theme
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("neopets.com") { BODY {background-color:#FFDCFF !important;} A:Link, A:Visited {color:#FC00B3 !important;} A:Hover {color:#FF90FF !important;} #main {border-color:#FFBCFF !important;} #header { background-color:#FC00B3 !important; background-image:url("http://i67.tinypic.com/a45r9y.jpg") !important;} #footer { background-color:#FC00B3 !important; background-image:url("http://i67.tinypic.com/a45r9y.jpg") !important;} ul.dropdown { border:1px solid #DC009B !important; background-color:#FA69FF !important;} LI:hover UL.dropdown A, LI.over UL.dropdown A {color:#000000 !important;} LI:hover UL.dropdown A:Hover, LI.over UL.dropdown A:hover {color:#DD5555 !important;} .eventIcon, .user {color: #000000 !important;} .eventIcon A:Link, .eventIcon A:Hover, .eventIcon A:Visited, .user A:Link, .user A:Hover, .user A:Visited {color:#991111 !important;} #nst {color: #000000 !important;} .sidebar, .neofriendUsername, .blistSmall div{background-color:#FFCDF6 !important} .sidebarModule, .contentModule {border: 2px solid #FEAFFF !important;} .sidebarTable td, .contentModuleTable td{border-color:#FFBCFF !important;} .sidebarTable, .contentModuleTable {border: 2px solid #FD55FF !important;} .sidebarHeader { background-color:#E254C9 !important; border-bottom: 2px solid #C9C9C9 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} .sidebarHeader A:Link, .sidebarHeader A:Hover, .sidebarHeader A:Visited{color:#991111 !important;} .contentModuleHeader, .contentModuleHeaderAlt { background-color:#E66ED1 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} .contentModuleHeader A:Link, .contentModuleHeader A:Hover, .contentModuleHeader A:Visited, .contentModuleHeaderAlt A:Link, .contentModuleHeaderAlt A:Hover, .contentModuleHeaderAlt A:Visited { color: #D5E8FE !important;} .moreLink, .moreLinkAlt { border: 1px solid #B221BB !important;} .footerForm {color: #000000 !important;} .copyright, .copyright A:Link, .copyright A:Hover, .copyright A:Visited {color: #000000 !important} #ban, .footerNifty {display:none !important} .marqueeSlot, .marqueeSlot A:Link, .marqueeSlot A:Hover, .marqueeSlot A:Visited { background-color:#EC86E6 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} .marqueeSlotOn, .marqueeSlotOn A:Link, .marqueeSlotOn A:Hover, .marqueeSlotOn A:Visited { background-color:#CE22C4 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} }
